entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
